catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
catalog_info.notes: Taught by Daria Khitrova and others. Hours to be arranged. Required for senior concentrators in Slavic Literature and Culture. Students who wish to enroll must obtain the signature of the Director of Undergraduate Studies. Honors students must also complete Slavic 99b.
catalog_info.description: For senior concentrators in Slavic Literature and Culture. Students work with a faculty advisor on a senior thesis or capstone project.
